card.name: ·Book of Mazarbul
card.text: Tale. Bearer must be a Dwarf. At the start of each fellowship phase when the fellowship is at site 4 or higher, you may draw a card for each Dwarf companion.

card.name: ·Gimli's Pipe
card.text: Bearer must be Gimli. Fellowship: Exert Gimli to add 1 to the number of pipes you can spot.

card.name: Mines of Khazad-Dûm
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time you play a {Dwarven} tale, you may heal a Dwarf companion.

card.name: A Royal Welcome
card.text: Plays to your support area. Regroup: Exert a Dwarf ally to heal a Dwarf companion.

card.name: Song of Durin
card.text: Tale. To play, exert a Dwarf. Plays to your support area. The twilight cost of each {Moria} weapon is +2. Fellowship: Discard this condition to discard up to 2 {Moria} conditions.

card.name: Storm of Argument
card.text: Fellowship: Reveal a card at random from an opponent's hand. Shuffle up to X {Dwarven} cards from your discard pile into your draw deck, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.

card.name: ·Arwen, Elven Rider
card.text: Ranger. Response: If the Ringbearer is about to take a wound, discard 3 cards from hand to prevent that wound.

card.name: ·Arwen, Lady Undómiel
card.text: While you can spot 3 {Elven} allies whose home is site 3, each minion skirmishing Arwen is strength -3.

card.name: Beren and Lúthien
card.text: Tale. Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Exert an {Elven} ally to discard the bottom card of your draw deck. If that card is an {Elven} card, make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -1.

card.name: ·Calaglin, Elf of Lórien
card.text: Archer. Regroup: Exert Calaglin to wound a minion.

card.name: Cast It Into the Fire!
card.text: Maneuver: Spot an Elf to make each opponent discard a card from his or her hand. Draw a card for each card discarded in this way.

card.name: ·Dínendal, Silent Scout
card.text: Archer. Regroup: Exert Dinendal to remove {2}.

card.name: ·Elrond, Herald to Gil-galad
card.text: At the start of each of your turns, you may spot an ally whose home is site 3 to heal that ally twice. Regroup: Exert Elrond twice to heal a companion.

card.name: ·Erestor, Chief Advisor to Elrond
card.text: To play, spot an Elf. Response: If an Elf is about to take a wound from a {Sauron} minion or {Sauron} event, exert Erestor to prevent that wound.

card.name: Forests of Lothlórien
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves, you may spot 3 {Elven} allies to wound a minion.

card.name: Friends of Old
card.text: Fellowship: Reveal a card at random from an opponent's hand. Heal X {Elven} allies, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.

card.name: ·Galadriel, Lady of the Golden Wood
card.text: At the start of each of your turns, you may heal an Elf. Fellowship: Exert Galadriel to play the fellowship's next site if it is a forest (replacing opponent's site if necessary).

card.name: ·Galdor, Councilor From the West
card.text: To play, spot an Elf. Regroup: Exert Galdor and spot a minion to return that minion to its owner's hand.

card.name: ·Gift of the Evenstar
card.text: To play, spot Arwen. Bearer must be Aragorn. Skirmish: Exert Aragorn or discard 2 cards from hand to make a minion skirmishing Aragorn strength -1.

card.name: ·Golradir, Councilor of Imladris
card.text: To play, spot an Elf. Skirmish: Exert Golradir to make an Orc strength -1.

card.name: ·Long-knives of Legolas
card.text: Bearer must be Legolas. Each Orc or Uruk-hai skirmishing Legolas is strength -2.

card.name: Master of Healing
card.text: Fellowship or Regroup: Spot Elrond (or 2 {Elven} allies) to heal a companion or ally.

card.name: ·Nenya
card.text: Bearer must be Galadriel. At the start of each regroup phase, you may discard up to 2 cards from hand to draw the same number of cards.

card.name: ·Phial of Galadriel
card.text: To play, exert an Elf. Bearer must be the Ring-bearer. Bearer's resistance is +2.

card.name: ·Saelbeth, Elven Councilor
card.text: To play, spot an Elf. Skirmish: Exert Saelbeth to make an Uruk-hai strength -1.

card.name: Something Draws Near
card.text: Fellowship or Maneuver: Exert an Elf to discard an {Isengard} possession or {Isengard} artifact.

card.name: ·Vilya
card.text: Bearer must be Elrond. Maneuver: Exert Elrond twice and spot a Shadow condition to return that condition to its owner's hand.

card.name: Voice of Nimrodel
card.text: Tale. Skirmish: Exert an Elf at a river or forest to cancel a skirmish involving that Elf.

card.name: Betrayal of Isengard
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time an opponent draws a card (or takes a card into hand) during the Shadow phase, you may remove {1}. Maneuver: Exert Gandalf to wound Saruman twice.

card.name: Deep in Thought
card.text: Spell. Maneuver: Spot Gandalf and 4 twilight tokens to discard all Shadow conditions.

card.name: Depart Silently
card.text: Stealth. Maneuver: At sites 1 to 5, spot Gandalf to prevent Hobbits from being assigned to skirmishes until the regroup phase. At any other site, spot Gandalf to make a Hobbit strength +3.

card.name: Fireworks
card.text: Spell. Fellowship: Spot Gandalf to shuffle up to 2 {Gandalf} or up to 2 {Shire} cards from your discard pile into your draw deck.

card.name: His First Serious Check
card.text: Maneuver: Spot Gandalf to reveal a card at random from an opponent's hand. You may add {X} to discard that card, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.

card.name: ·Narya
card.text: Bearer must be Gandalf. At the start of each of your turns, you may add {3} to remove a burden.

card.name: Trust Me as You Once Did
card.text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Exert Gandalf to make a companion strength +1 for each companion with the Gandalf signet you can spot (limit +3).

card.name: Unknown Perils
card.text: Plays to your support area. Response: If a companion is about to take a wound, spot 4 twilight tokens and exert Gandalf to prevent that wound.

card.name: Answering the Cries
card.text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Discard a {Gondor} tale from hand to make a {Gondor} companion strength +2.

card.name: ·Aragorn, Heir to the White City
card.text: Ranger. Each time the fellowship moves during the fellowship phase, remove {2}.

card.name: Banner of the White Tree
card.text: Tale. Maneuver: Exert a {Gondor} companion to make that companion strength +3 and defender +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Citadel of Minas Tirith
card.text: Plays to your support area. You may heal a {Gondor} companion at the end of each turn during which no companion or ally lost a skirmish.

card.name: Gondor Bowmen
card.text: Tale. Plays to your support area. Archery: Exert a {Gondor} companion and discard this condition to make the fellowship archery total +2.

card.name: ·Horn of Boromir
card.text: Bearer must be Boromir. Maneuver: Exert Boromir and spot an ally. Until the regroup phase, that ally is strength +3 and participates in archery fire and skirmishes.

card.name: Might of Númenor
card.text: Tale. Maneuver: Spot a {Gondor} companion to reveal a card at random from an opponent's hand. Heal X companions, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.

card.name: ·The Shards of Narsil
card.text: Plays to your support area. Fellowship: Stack a {Gondor} card from hand here. Fellowship: Add {1} to take a card stacked here into hand.

card.name: Some Who Resisted
card.text: Tale. Maneuver: Spot a {Gondor} companion to make the twilight cost of each maneuver event +2.

card.name: Still Sharp
card.text: Skirmish: Spot The Shards of Narsil to make a {Gondor} companion strength +3 and damage +1.

card.name: Voice of Rauros
card.text: Maneuver: Exert Aragorn to make each companion with the Aragorn signet damage +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: We Must Go Warily
card.text: Response: If the fellowship moves in the regroup phase, exert a {Gondor} companion twice to make each minion's twilight cost +1 until the next regroup phase.

card.name: Abandoning Reason for Madness
card.text: Shadow: Spot an {Isengard} minion to discard up to 3 cards from hand and draw an equal number of cards.

card.name: Can You Protect Me From Yourself?
card.text: Maneuver: Spot an {Isengard} minion to exhaust Aragorn. The Free Peoples player may add 2 burdens to prevent this.

card.name: Coming for the Ring
card.text: Regroup: Reveal a card at random from the Free Peoples player's hand. Heal X {Isengard} minions, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.

card.name: A Fell Voice on the Air
card.text: Plays to your support area. Shadow: Exert Saruman to play an {Isengard} weather condition from your discard pile. Its twilight cost is -2.

card.name: Hate and Anger
card.text: Shadow: Spot an Uruk-hai and a {Moria} minion to draw 3 cards.

card.name: Hollowing of Isengard
card.text: To play, spot an {Isengard} Orc. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Discard this condition to add {3}.

card.name: Isengard Axe
card.text: Bearer must be an {Isengard} Orc. When you play this weapon, add {1}.

card.name: Isengard Forger
card.text: Shadow: Exert this minion to add {1}.

card.name: Isengard Retainer
card.text: Regroup: Exert this minion to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.

card.name: Isengard Servant
card.text: Regroup: Exert this minion to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.

card.name: Isengard Shaman
card.text: Response: If an {Isengard} Orc is about to take a wound, remove {2} to prevent that wound.

card.name: Isengard Smith
card.text: Regroup: Exert this minion to discard a weapon (or all Free Peoples possessions if you can spot 5 companions).

card.name: Isengard Warrior
card.text: While you can spot another {Isengard} Orc, no player may use archery special abilities. Regroup: Exert this minion and spot 3 wounds on the Ring-bearer to exert every companion.

card.name: Isengard Worker
card.text: Regroup: Exert this minion to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.

card.name: One of You Must Do This
card.text: Maneuver: Exert an {Isengard} minion to make the Free Peoples player exert X companions, where X is the number of these races you can spot in the fellowship: Dwarf, Elf, Man, and Wizard.

card.name: ·Orc Commander
card.text: Each other {Isengard} Orc is strength +1. Regroup: Exert Orc Commander to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.

card.name: ·Orc Overseer
card.text: Regroup: Exert Orc Overseer twice to exhaust a companion (except the Ringbearer).

card.name: ·Orthanc Berserker
card.text: Damage +1. Maneuver: Spot 5 burdens and exert Orthanc Berserker twice to exhaust a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

card.name: ·The Palantír of Orthanc
card.text: To play, spot an {Isengard} minion. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Spot an {Isengard} minion and remove {1} to reveal a card at random from the Free Peoples player's hand. Place that card on top of that player's draw deck.

card.name: ·Saruman, Keeper of Isengard
card.text: Saruman may not take wounds during the archery phase and may not be assigned to a skirmish. Uruk-hai are fierce. Response: If an Uruk-hai is about to take a wound, exert Saruman to prevent that wound.

card.name: ·Saruman, Servant of the Eye
card.text: Saruman may not take wounds during the archery phase and may not be assigned to a skirmish. Assignment: Exert Saruman to assign an {Isengard} minion to a companion (except the Ring-bearer). That companion may exert to prevent this.

card.name: Servants to Saruman
card.text: Skirmish: Make an {Isengard} Orc strength +2 (or +3 if you have fewer than 3 cards in hand).

card.name: Tower of Orthanc
card.text: To play, spot an {Isengard} minion. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves, you may spot an exhausted companion to add {3}.

card.name: Trapped and Alone
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each character skirmishing an {Isengard} Orc loses all damage bonuses from weapons.

card.name: The Trees Are Strong
card.text: Regroup: Discard X {Isengard} Orcs to make the Free Peoples player wound X companions.

card.name: Uruk Raider
card.text: Damage +1. While an ally is in the dead pile, this minion is strength +3 and fierce.

card.name: Uruk Ravager
card.text: Damage +1. When you play this minion, you may spot Saruman to add {2}.

card.name: Dangerous Gamble
card.text: Shadow: Spot a {Moria} minion to reveal a card at random from the Free Peoples player's hand. Add {X}, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.

card.name: Depths of Moria
card.text: To play, spot a {Moria} Orc. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, add {2}.

card.name: Hide and Seek
card.text: Search. Skirmish: Spot 2 {Shire} companions to make a {Moria} minion damage +1.

card.name: Malice
card.text: Archery: Spot a {Moria} Orc and a ã Orc to wound an archer.

card.name: Such a Little Thing
card.text: Maneuver: Spot a {Moria} minion to wound Boromir 3 times. The Free Peoples player may discard 2 Free Peoples possessions to prevent this.

card.name: Gates of the Dead City
card.text: To play, spot a Nazgûl. Plays to your support area. Each time a {Ringwraith} card adds a burden, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion.

card.name: News of Mordor
card.text: Skirmish: Spot an {Isengard} minion to make a Nazgûl damage +1.

card.name: ·The Ring Draws Them
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves, add {1} for each burden you can spot. At the end of each of your Shadow phases, exert a Nazgûl or discard this condition.

card.name: They Will Never Stop Hunting You
card.text: Maneuver: Spot a Nazgûl to reveal a card at random from the Free Peoples player's hand. Exert a companion bearing a ranged weapon X times, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.

card.name: Too Great and Terrible
card.text: Maneuver: Spot a Nazgûl to wound Gandalf twice. The Free Peoples player may discard 2 {Gandalf} cards from hand to prevent this.

card.name: ·Úlairë Otsëa, Ringwraith in Twilight
card.text: Twilight. Each time Úlairë Otsëa wins a skirmish, you may exert him to transfer Blade Tip from your support area to the Ringbearer.

card.name: The Dark Lord Advances
card.text: Regroup: Exert a {Sauron} minion to reveal a card at random from the Free Peoples player's hand. That player must discard X cards from hand, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.

card.name: Get Off the Road!
card.text: Search. Shadow: Spot a {Sauron} minion and a Nazgûl to make the Free Peoples player discard a card from the top of his or her deck for each burden you can spot.

card.name: Gleaming in the Snow
card.text: Regroup: Exert a {Sauron} Orc and spot a {Gondor} companion to add a burden.

card.name: Hand of Sauron
card.text: Maneuver: Exert a {Sauron} minion to make the Free Peoples player discard a card at random from his or her hand.

card.name: His Cruelty and Malice
card.text: Plays to your support area. Regroup: Exert a {Sauron} minion to make the Free Peoples player discard the top card from his or her draw deck.

card.name: Massing in the East
card.text: Regroup: Exert a {Sauron} minion to discard a card from the top of the Free Peoples player's draw deck for each of these races you can spot in the fellowship: Dwarf, Elf, Man, and Wizard.

card.name: Morgul Slayer
card.text: Regroup: Exert this minion to wound a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

card.name: Orc Butcher
card.text: For each {Sauron} condition you can spot, this minion is strength +1.

card.name: Orc Guard
card.text: Maneuver: Exert this minion and discard your {Sauron} condition to discard a Free Peoples condition.

card.name: Orc Pillager
card.text: For each Free Peoples card borne by a character this minion is skirmishing, that character is strength -1.

card.name: Orc Slayer
card.text: Regroup: Exert this minion to wound a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

card.name: Orc Swordsman
card.text: While this minion bears a weapon, he is strength +2.

card.name: Orc Trooper
card.text: For each card in your hand, this minion is strength +1.

card.name: Orc Veteran
card.text: Skirmish: Discard your {Sauron} condition to make a character skirmishing this minion strength -1.

card.name: Orc Warrior
card.text: Maneuver: Exert this minion and discard your {Sauron} condition to make the Free Peoples player discard the top 2 cards from his or her draw deck.

card.name: ·Our List of Allies Grows Thin
card.text: To play, exert a {Sauron} minion. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves, add {1} for each ally you can spot.

card.name: Terrible as the Dawn
card.text: Maneuver: Spot a {Sauron} minion to wound Galadriel 3 times. The Free Peoples player may discard 2 Elves to prevent this.

card.name: Tower of Barad-dûr
card.text: To play, exert a {Sauron} minion. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves, the Free Peoples player must discard a card from hand.

card.name: Why Shouldn't I Keep It?
card.text: Maneuver: Spot a {Sauron} minion to discard Bilbo. The Free Peoples player may discard 2 Free Peoples conditions to prevent this.

card.name: ·Bill the Pony
card.text: Bearer must be a Hobbit companion. The Shadow number of each site is -1. Discard Bill the Pony when at an underground site.

card.name: ·Frodo's Pipe
card.text: Bearer must be Frodo. Fellowship: Discard a pipeweed possession and spot X pipes to heal a companion with the Frodo signet X times.

card.name: Frying Pan
card.text: Bearer must be a Hobbit. Skirmish: Exert bearer to wound an Orc he or she is skirmishing.

card.name: Meant to Be Alone
card.text: Fellowship: Spot a Hobbit companion (except the Ring-bearer) to reveal a card at random from an opponent's hand. Remove {X}, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.

card.name: ·Melilot Brandybuck, Merry Dancer
card.text: Response: If a burden is about to be added by a Shadow card, exert Melilot to prevent that burden.

card.name: ·Old Noakes, Purveyor of Wisdoms
card.text: Each time a Shadow card makes you discard a card from hand, you may also discard a minion or Shadow condition.

card.name: Seek and Hide
card.text: Stealth. Skirmish: Spot 2 {Shire} companions to make a minion lose all damage bonuses.

card.name: The Shire Countryside
card.text: To play, spot 2 {Shire} companions. Plays to your support area. Each time you remove a burden (except by a Hobbit's game text), you may heal a companion.

card.name: Three Monstrous Trolls
card.text: Tale. Plays to your support area. Response: If a Shadow card is about to add any number of twilight tokens, exert a Hobbit ally to prevent this.

card.name: Caras Galadhon
card.text: Forest. Sanctuary. While the fellowship is at Caras Galadhon, no more than one minion may be assigned to each skirmish.

card.name: Eregion Hills
card.text: When the fellowship moves to Eregion Hills, add a burden.

card.name: Gates of Argonath
card.text: River. Maneuver events may not be played.

card.name: The Great River
card.text: River. While the fellowship is at The Great River, cards may not be played from draw decks or discard piles.

card.name: House of Elrond
card.text: Sanctuary. When the fellowship moves to House of Elrond, the Free Peoples player may spot 2 Elves to remove a burden.

card.name: Wastes of Emyn Muil
card.text: Maneuver: Spot 4 companions and exert your {Isengard} Orc to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.

card.name: ·Legolas, Son of Thranduil
card.text: Archer. While Legolas is at a river or forest, add 1 to the fellowship archery total.

card.name: ·Boromir, Defender of Minas Tirith
card.text: Ranger. Fellowship: Add {2} to heal Boromir.
